title: Rental for 7 days?
body:
I just rented a skin ward from the new loot system and after 7 days it's gone :S? I thought I'd be able to make it permanent after testing/trialing it out 7 days? Did riot say once you test it, it dissapears?

They should make it exactly what it says which is "rent" and then be able to purchase it to permanent if we liked it.

replies.body:
Hello,

I'm sorry to tell you that Riot did say that after you 'Rented' a Skin via Hextech Crafting that the Skin Shard would be consumed and you will be unable to activate the skin after the 7 day period. Quote from the [Riot Support Page on Hextech Crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide): _Activate a shard to “rent” a champion for 7 days. This does consume the shard, so you won't be able to use it again until you find another.
_

Regards,
PRIMAL
